Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Derag Livinghotel Königin Luise in Berlin (Weissensee), you'll be minutes from Weissensee Park and close to Alexanderplatz. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Lido Orankesee and Sportforum.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 195 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchenettes with refrigerators and stovetops. Wired and wireless Internet access is complimentary, and flat-screen televisions with satellite programming provide entertainment. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy a range of recreational amenities, including a sauna, a steam room, and a fitness center. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access, a television in the lobby, and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Planning an event in Berlin? This hotel has facilities measuring 7535 square feet (700 square meters), including a meeting room. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Weissensee Park - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Lido Orankesee - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Sportforum - 2 km / 1.3 mi
Velodrom - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Schonhauser Allee Arkaden - 3 km / 1.9 mi
Volkspark Friedrichshain - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi
Kollwitzplatz - 3.3 km / 2.1 mi
Max-Schmeling-Halle - 3.6 km / 2.2 mi
Friedrich-Ludwig-Jahn-Sportpark - 3.6 km / 2.2 mi
Mauerpark - 3.9 km / 2.4 mi
Volksbuhne - 4.4 km / 2.7 mi
Gesundbrunnen Shopping Center - 4.6 km / 2.9 mi
Berlin Conference Center - 4.7 km / 2.9 mi
Alexanderplatz - 4.7 km / 2.9 mi
Simon-Dach-Strasse - 4.7 km / 2.9 mi

The nearest airports are:
Berlin (TXL-Tegel) - 11 km / 6.9 mi
Berlin (SXF-Schoenefeld) - 18.6 km / 11.5 mi

The preferred airport for Derag Livinghotel Königin Luise is Berlin (TXL-Tegel).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Derag Hotel and Living Hotel Koenigin Luise is Berlin (TXL-Tegel) - 11 km / 6.8 mi.
